title: (x) "Post-Wood" 3D shadowed slab serif - Vineta {Stephen}
content:
Need help IDing this nice shadowed font used to spell “POST-WOOD”. Any suggestions? thanks,  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821151137im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/POST-WOOD_3416.jpg)

 [‹ SukhoThai logo handwritten script](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821151137/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40575 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Handwritten looking serif face - Minya {Brandon S} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821151137/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40542 "Go to next forum topic")
author: SKUMATIK
